techmeme.title: Tim Cook posts that "this week" there's "something in the AIR", likely referring to an M4 MacBook Air launch; a new iPad Air is also expected this Spring (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
India's IT ministry says AWS plans to invest $8.2B in India's western state of Maharashtra over the next few years, and will deploy its own GPUs in India (Reuters)
Stability AI partners with Arm to bring Stability's Stable Audio Open, an AI model that can generate audio including sound effects, to Arm-based mobile devices (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Microsoft unveils Dragon Copilot, a new voice-activated AI assistant for doctors, combining Dragon Medical One and ambient listening service DAX Copilot (Ashley Capoot/CNBC)
Builder.ai CEO Sachin Dev Duggal says he is stepping down from the London-based startup, which has raised $450M to use AI to develop apps and websites (Alexandra Heal/Financial Times)
